name: JellyBridge
description: Bridge Jellyfin with Jellyseerr for seamless show discovery and download requests

versions.changelog: Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.36 - Fixed scroll links to use span elements instead of anchor tags to avoid Jellyfin hashtag navigation conflicts. Increased scroll offset to 60px default and 100px for Network Services link to provide better visual spacing. Fixed Generate Network Folders to properly use Library Prefix through GetNetworkFolder and added early return if UseNetworkFolders is not enabled.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.36 - Fixed scroll links to use span elements instead of anchor tags to avoid Jellyfin hashtag navigation conflicts. Increased scroll offset to 60px default and 100px for Network Services link to provide better visual spacing. Fixed Generate Network Folders to properly use Library Prefix through GetNetworkFolder and added early return if UseNetworkFolders is not enabled.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.35 - Added Network Folder Setup Instructions section with numbered steps and cross-references to Library Setup Instructions. Enhanced scrollToElement function to automatically open parent details elements when scrolling to linked options. Made Generate Network Folders button always visible and renamed Network Folder Options to Network Folder Setup.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.35 - Added Network Folder Setup Instructions section with numbered steps and cross-references to Library Setup Instructions. Enhanced scrollToElement function to automatically open parent details elements when scrolling to linked options. Made Generate Network Folders button always visible and renamed Network Folder Options to Network Folder Setup.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.34 - Fixed scroll-to-checkbox functionality for disabled fields by allowing pointer events on containers while blocking them only on form elements. Made Network Folder Options details appear disabled but remain clickable with proper cursor and hover feedback. Updated disabled state styling to ensure click handlers work correctly while maintaining visual disabled appearance.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.34 - Fixed scroll-to-checkbox functionality for disabled fields by allowing pointer events on containers while blocking them only on form elements. Made Network Folder Options details appear disabled but remain clickable with proper cursor and hover feedback. Updated disabled state styling to ensure click handlers work correctly while maintaining visual disabled appearance.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.33 - Improved disabled element UI styling with cursor: not-allowed for better user feedback. Added feature to manually request JellyBridge library favorites in Jellyseerr. Updated README with improved release notes structure and compatibility information.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.33 - Improved disabled element UI styling with cursor: not-allowed for better user feedback. Added feature to manually request JellyBridge library favorites in Jellyseerr. Updated README with improved release notes structure and compatibility information.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.32 - Renamed CreateSeparateLibraries to UseNetworkFolders across all code. Added collapsible Network Folder Options detail dropdown that opens/closes with the checkbox. Reorganized UI elements by moving Add Duplicate Content above generate button and combining caution text, plus added Release 2.0 compatibility note to README.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.32 - Renamed CreateSeparateLibraries to UseNetworkFolders across all code. Added collapsible Network Folder Options detail dropdown that opens/closes with the checkbox. Reorganized UI elements by moving Add Duplicate Content above generate button and combining caution text, plus added Release 2.0 compatibility note to README.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.31 - Improved help button hover behavior by moving cursor styling to container and applying icon background color change when hovering anywhere on the button including the Setup text.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.31 - Improved help button hover behavior by moving cursor styling to container and applying icon background color change when hovering anywhere on the button including the Setup text.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.30 - Refactored monolithic RouteController into specialized controllers (PluginConfigurationController, GeneralSettingsController, ImportDiscoverContentController, SortDiscoverContentController, ManageDiscoverLibraryController, AdvancedSettingsController, TaskStatusController). Moved library setup instructions above test connection button and converted troubleshooting section to collapsible details. Updated all service using statements to minimal sets and improved service class summaries.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.30 - Refactored monolithic RouteController into specialized controllers (PluginConfigurationController, GeneralSettingsController, ImportDiscoverContentController, SortDiscoverContentController, ManageDiscoverLibraryController, AdvancedSettingsController, TaskStatusController). Moved library setup instructions above test connection button and converted troubleshooting section to collapsible details. Updated all service using statements to minimal sets and improved service class summaries.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.29 - Added AddDuplicateContent configuration option to allow duplicate media in network folders when separate libraries are enabled, with UI warning about proper usage. Updated FilterDuplicateMedia to use GetConfigOrDefault and skip filtering when both CreateSeparateLibraries and AddDuplicateContent are enabled. Added AddDuplicateContent to configuration endpoints and fixed Smart sort order case to explicitly fall through to default behavior.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.29 - Added AddDuplicateContent configuration option to allow duplicate media in network folders when separate libraries are enabled, with UI warning about proper usage. Updated FilterDuplicateMedia to use GetConfigOrDefault and skip filtering when both CreateSeparateLibraries and AddDuplicateContent are enabled. Added AddDuplicateContent to configuration endpoints and fixed Smart sort order case to explicitly fall through to default behavior.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.28 - Added scroll-to-checkbox functionality when clicking disabled fields. Centralized disabled state styling and scroll handler logic into reusable utility functions. Removed beta tag and note from Create separate libraries option.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.28 - Added scroll-to-checkbox functionality when clicking disabled fields. Centralized disabled state styling and scroll handler logic into reusable utility functions. Removed beta tag and note from Create separate libraries option.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.27 - Fixed SortOrder dropdown initialization to convert enum name strings (like 'Random') to integer values when populating from ConfigDefaults. Added enum name-to-value mapping to ensure dropdown correctly displays selected option when no explicit config value is set.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.27 - Fixed SortOrder dropdown initialization to convert enum name strings (like 'Random') to integer values when populating from ConfigDefaults. Added enum name-to-value mapping to ensure dropdown correctly displays selected option when no explicit config value is set.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.26 - Refactored MetadataService and SyncService to process movies and shows in a unified list. Added FilterDuplicateMedia function to DiscoverService for duplicate removal using item hashing. Cleaned up unused dependencies and using statements across all services.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.26 - Refactored MetadataService and SyncService to process movies and shows in a unified list. Added FilterDuplicateMedia function to DiscoverService for duplicate removal using item hashing. Cleaned up unused dependencies and using statements across all services.
Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.25 - Added JsonNumberEnumConverter to SortOrderOptions enum to ensure proper numeric serialization for frontend compatibility.
Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.25 - Added JsonNumberEnumConverter to SortOrderOptions enum to ensure proper numeric serialization for frontend compatibility.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.24 - Refactored sort functionality into new SortService class and added BridgeConfiguration with SortOrderOptions enum. Replaced boolean sort toggle with dropdown (None/Random/Smart) and added dynamic enum population via ConfigOptions. Made ScanAllLibraries async/awaitable and renamed DefaultValues to ConfigDefaults in frontend.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.24 - Refactored sort functionality into new SortService class and added BridgeConfiguration with SortOrderOptions enum. Replaced boolean sort toggle with dropdown (None/Random/Smart) and added dynamic enum population via ConfigOptions. Made ScanAllLibraries async/awaitable and renamed DefaultValues to ConfigDefaults in frontend.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.23 - Added Mark Shows Played checkbox to change unplayed badge from 1 to checkmark. Created refreshOptionsUpdate for user data refresh and reordered RefreshBridgeLibrary parameters. Updated SortTask to skip library refresh after play count updates since UI updates automatically when items are viewed.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.23 - Added Mark Shows Played checkbox to change unplayed badge from 1 to checkmark. Created refreshOptionsUpdate for user data refresh and reordered RefreshBridgeLibrary parameters. Updated SortTask to skip library refresh after play count updates since UI updates automatically when items are viewed.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.22 - Removed TryMarkPlayed method from JellyfinIUserDataManager and inlined the Played=true logic directly in JellyfinSeries.TrySetEpisodePlayCount to ensure only the placeholder episode is marked as played, not all BaseItems. This prevents accidental marking of other items while maintaining the fix for series unplayed badges.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.22 - Removed TryMarkPlayed method from JellyfinIUserDataManager and inlined the Played=true logic directly in JellyfinSeries.TrySetEpisodePlayCount to ensure only the placeholder episode is marked as played, not all BaseItems. This prevents accidental marking of other items while maintaining the fix for series unplayed badges.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.21 - Fixed placeholder episode play status by setting Played=true when play count > 0. Jellyfin uses the Played flag (not just PlayCount) to determine if episodes are played, which affects the series unplayed badge. Updated TryUpdatePlayCount to set both PlayCount and Played flag appropriately.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.21 - Fixed placeholder episode play status by setting Played=true when play count > 0. Jellyfin uses the Played flag (not just PlayCount) to determine if episodes are played, which affects the series unplayed badge. Updated TryUpdatePlayCount to set both PlayCount and Played flag appropriately.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.20 - Enhanced placeholder episode play count logic to return detailed result objects with success status and descriptive messages instead of nullable bool. Added comprehensive logging to identify why placeholder episode play counts fail (episode not found, userData null, play count already > 0, or update failure). Sorted directories by play count before processing to ensure lower play counts are handled first.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.20 - Enhanced placeholder episode play count logic to return detailed result objects with success status and descriptive messages instead of nullable bool. Added comprehensive logging to identify why placeholder episode play counts fail (episode not found, userData null, play count already > 0, or update failure). Sorted directories by play count before processing to ensure lower play counts are handled first.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.19 - Enhanced placeholder episode play count logic with better error handling and logging. Changed TrySetEpisodePlayCount to return nullable bool (null when userData is null, false when episode not found or play count > 0, true when set). Removed exception catching to let errors cascade for better debugging and added detailed trace logging to identify why placeholder episode play counts aren't being set.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.19 - Enhanced placeholder episode play count logic with better error handling and logging. Changed TrySetEpisodePlayCount to return nullable bool (null when userData is null, false when episode not found or play count > 0, true when set). Removed exception catching to let errors cascade for better debugging and added detailed trace logging to identify why placeholder episode play counts aren't being set.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.18 - Updated library refresh options to differentiate between create and remove operations. Create operations now use ReplaceAllMetadata=false to search for missing metadata only, while remove operations use ReplaceAllMetadata=true to replace all metadata. This preserves existing metadata when refreshing newly added items while ensuring complete refresh for removed items.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.18 - Updated library refresh options to differentiate between create and remove operations. Create operations now use ReplaceAllMetadata=false to search for missing metadata only, while remove operations use ReplaceAllMetadata=true to replace all metadata. This preserves existing metadata when refreshing newly added items while ensuring complete refresh for removed items.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.17 - Cleaned up unused functions in JellyfinSeries wrapper class. Removed user parameter requirement from GetPlaceholderEpisode by using GetRecursiveChildren directly. Added preprocessor directives for version compatibility between Jellyfin 10.10 and 10.11. Renamed TrySetPlaceholderEpisodePlayCount to TrySetEpisodePlayCount for consistency.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.17 - Cleaned up unused functions in JellyfinSeries wrapper class. Removed user parameter requirement from GetPlaceholderEpisode by using GetRecursiveChildren directly. Added preprocessor directives for version compatibility between Jellyfin 10.10 and 10.11. Renamed TrySetPlaceholderEpisodePlayCount to TrySetEpisodePlayCount for consistency.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.16 - Changed play count randomization to use increments of 100 instead of 1 to ensure sort order remains stable when users play items. Updated SortTask to use ExecuteWithLockAsync for consistency with other plugin operations. Moved play count warning to a separate styled div on the configuration page.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.16 - Changed play count randomization to use increments of 100 instead of 1 to ensure sort order remains stable when users play items. Updated SortTask to use ExecuteWithLockAsync for consistency with other plugin operations. Moved play count warning to a separate styled div on the configuration page.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.15 - Added descriptive text under each configuration section header to improve user understanding. Renamed Sort Randomization Interval to Sort Task Interval across all files for clearer naming. Refactored play count randomization to use dictionary iteration for better efficiency and moved season folder creation logic to PlaceholderVideoGenerator static methods.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.15 - Added descriptive text under each configuration section header to improve user understanding. Renamed Sort Randomization Interval to Sort Task Interval across all files for clearer naming. Refactored play count randomization to use dictionary iteration for better efficiency and moved season folder creation logic to PlaceholderVideoGenerator static methods.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.14 - Renamed RandomizeSortTask to SortTask and restored parallel processing: Renamed RandomizeSortTask class and file to SortTask for clearer naming, updating task key from JellyBridgeRandomizeSort to JellyBridgeSort. Restored parallel processing in RandomizePlayCountAsync using Task.WhenAll for both item and user updates to improve performance. Added skipped items list to separate ignored files (.ignore) from actual failures in return values. Enhanced error handling with OperationCanceledException catching during parallel operations. Updated RouteController and SortTask to handle the new skipped items list in results.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.14 - Renamed RandomizeSortTask to SortTask and restored parallel processing: Renamed RandomizeSortTask class and file to SortTask for clearer naming, updating task key from JellyBridgeRandomizeSort to JellyBridgeSort. Restored parallel processing in RandomizePlayCountAsync using Task.WhenAll for both item and user updates to improve performance. Added skipped items list to separate ignored files (.ignore) from actual failures in return values. Enhanced error handling with OperationCanceledException catching during parallel operations. Updated RouteController and SortTask to handle the new skipped items list in results.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.13 - Refactored sort randomization and fixed duplicate user handling: Renamed RandomizeNfoDateAddedAsync to RandomizePlayCountAsync to accurately reflect that it randomizes play counts instead of date added metadata. Updated play count assignment to start at 1000 instead of 0 to avoid conflicts with actual user play counts. Fixed duplicate JellyfinUserGuid handling by moving duplicate filtering to GetJellyseerrUsersAsync source method, ensuring all callers receive clean user lists. Updated TrySetFavorite and TryUpdatePlayCount methods in JellyfinIUserDataManager to use version-specific preprocessor directives for proper handling of nullable return types between Jellyfin 10.10 and 10.11. Updated all documentation, configuration descriptions, and UI text to reference play counts instead of date added metadata. Reordered code in RandomizePlayCountAsync to check for users before shuffling directories for better error handling.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.13 - Refactored sort randomization and fixed duplicate user handling: Renamed RandomizeNfoDateAddedAsync to RandomizePlayCountAsync to accurately reflect that it randomizes play counts instead of date added metadata. Updated play count assignment to start at 1000 instead of 0 to avoid conflicts with actual user play counts. Fixed duplicate JellyfinUserGuid handling by moving duplicate filtering to GetJellyseerrUsersAsync source method, ensuring all callers receive clean user lists. Updated TrySetFavorite and TryUpdatePlayCount methods in JellyfinIUserDataManager to use version-specific preprocessor directives for proper handling of nullable return types between Jellyfin 10.10 and 10.11. Updated all documentation, configuration descriptions, and UI text to reference play counts instead of date added metadata. Reordered code in RandomizePlayCountAsync to check for users before shuffling directories for better error handling.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.12 - Enhanced movie discovery in FindItemByDirectoryPath: Added fallback logic to search for video files (mkv, mp4, avi, m4v, mov, wmv, flv, webm, mpg, mpeg, m2ts, ts, mts) within the directory and attempt FindByPath on those file paths. This helps locate movies where Jellyfin stores the item path as the video file path rather than the directory path, significantly improving success rate for movie item discovery without using the problematic GetItemList method.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.12 - Enhanced movie discovery in FindItemByDirectoryPath: Added fallback logic to search for video files (mkv, mp4, avi, m4v, mov, wmv, flv, webm, mpg, mpeg, m2ts, ts, mts) within the directory and attempt FindByPath on those file paths. This helps locate movies where Jellyfin stores the item path as the video file path rather than the directory path, significantly improving success rate for movie item discovery without using the problematic GetItemList method.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.11 - Fixed deserialization errors in FindItemByDirectoryPath: Removed GetItemList fallback that was causing InvalidOperationException errors when querying library items due to unknown item types. The method now only uses FindByPath (trying both folder and non-folder modes) and returns null if items cannot be found, allowing graceful failure handling instead of crashing the entire operation.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.11 - Fixed deserialization errors in FindItemByDirectoryPath: Removed GetItemList fallback that was causing InvalidOperationException errors when querying library items due to unknown item types. The method now only uses FindByPath (trying both folder and non-folder modes) and returns null if items cannot be found, allowing graceful failure handling instead of crashing the entire operation.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.10 - Improved item discovery for play count randomization: Added FindItemByDirectoryPath method to JellyfinILibraryManager that tries multiple strategies to find items by directory path - first attempts FindByPath as folder (for shows), then as non-folder (for movies), and finally searches all items by ContainingFolderPath match as a fallback. This fixes issues where movies stored with video file paths instead of directory paths were not being found. Updated RandomizeNfoDateAddedAsync to use the new FindItemByDirectoryPath method, which should significantly reduce failures when updating play counts.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.10 - Improved item discovery for play count randomization: Added FindItemByDirectoryPath method to JellyfinILibraryManager that tries multiple strategies to find items by directory path - first attempts FindByPath as folder (for shows), then as non-folder (for movies), and finally searches all items by ContainingFolderPath match as a fallback. This fixes issues where movies stored with video file paths instead of directory paths were not being found. Updated RandomizeNfoDateAddedAsync to use the new FindItemByDirectoryPath method, which should significantly reduce failures when updating play counts.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.9 - Refactored sort randomization from dateadded to play counts and moved MediaBrowser dependencies to JellyfinModels wrappers: Replaced NFO dateadded field manipulation with play count randomization for all users. Removed UpdateDateAddedInNfoFile method entirely. Updated RandomizeNfoDateAddedAsync to randomize play counts (0 to itemCount-1) for all discover library items across all users, enabling random sorting by play count. Created JellyfinIUserManager wrapper class and added TryUpdatePlayCount method to JellyfinIUserDataManager. Moved all MediaBrowser.Controller dependencies out of MetadataService into JellyfinModels wrappers. Updated RouteController to display play count information instead of dateAdded in sort results. Registered JellyfinIUserManager in dependency injection. Removed RefreshBridgeLibrary call as play count updates don't require metadata refresh.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.9 - Refactored sort randomization from dateadded to play counts and moved MediaBrowser dependencies to JellyfinModels wrappers: Replaced NFO dateadded field manipulation with play count randomization for all users. Removed UpdateDateAddedInNfoFile method entirely. Updated RandomizeNfoDateAddedAsync to randomize play counts (0 to itemCount-1) for all discover library items across all users, enabling random sorting by play count. Created JellyfinIUserManager wrapper class and added TryUpdatePlayCount method to JellyfinIUserDataManager. Moved all MediaBrowser.Controller dependencies out of MetadataService into JellyfinModels wrappers. Updated RouteController to display play count information instead of dateAdded in sort results. Registered JellyfinIUserManager in dependency injection. Removed RefreshBridgeLibrary call as play count updates don't require metadata refresh.
Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.8 - Code formatting cleanup: Normalized whitespace and line endings in MetadataService.cs for consistent code style.
Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.8 - Code formatting cleanup: Normalized whitespace and line endings in MetadataService.cs for consistent code style.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.7 - Fixed discover library sort randomization to use unique dates instead of random times: Updated RandomizeNfoDateAddedAsync to assign unique calendar dates (one per item) distributed over the last X days starting from yesterday going backwards, with time set to 00:00:00 since Jellyfin only sorts by calendar date. Added detailed success/failure tracking with return values. Enhanced SortLibrary endpoint to display detailed results including top 10 items by sort order and failed files. Improved error handling by throwing exceptions instead of returning null. Updated UpdateDateAddedInNfoFile to accept assigned DateTimeOffset parameter and extract item metadata (name, type) from XML.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.7 - Fixed discover library sort randomization to use unique dates instead of random times: Updated RandomizeNfoDateAddedAsync to assign unique calendar dates (one per item) distributed over the last X days starting from yesterday going backwards, with time set to 00:00:00 since Jellyfin only sorts by calendar date. Added detailed success/failure tracking with return values. Enhanced SortLibrary endpoint to display detailed results including top 10 items by sort order and failed files. Improved error handling by throwing exceptions instead of returning null. Updated UpdateDateAddedInNfoFile to accept assigned DateTimeOffset parameter and extract item metadata (name, type) from XML.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.6 - Reorganized UI sections and added sort randomization features: Renamed Discover Settings to Import Discover Content and Favorite Settings to Manage Discover Library throughout UI, JavaScript, and documentation. Added Sort Discover Content section with Randomize Discover Sort Order checkbox and configurable interval. Created RandomizeSortTask scheduled task to randomize NFO dateadded fields and refresh library metadata. Added manual Sort Library button and endpoint for on-demand sort randomization. Added TaskTimeoutMinutes configuration (default 10 minutes) to control plugin task timeouts. Updated ExecuteWithLockAsync to use configured task timeout as default. Refactored JavaScript function names to match new naming conventions (initializeImportContent, initializeManageLibrary, initializeSortContent, etc.). Updated all timeout error messages to reflect actual configured timeout values. Reorganized configuration files and README to match new UI layout.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.6 - Reorganized UI sections and added sort randomization features: Renamed Discover Settings to Import Discover Content and Favorite Settings to Manage Discover Library throughout UI, JavaScript, and documentation. Added Sort Discover Content section with Randomize Discover Sort Order checkbox and configurable interval. Created RandomizeSortTask scheduled task to randomize NFO dateadded fields and refresh library metadata. Added manual Sort Library button and endpoint for on-demand sort randomization. Added TaskTimeoutMinutes configuration (default 10 minutes) to control plugin task timeouts. Updated ExecuteWithLockAsync to use configured task timeout as default. Refactored JavaScript function names to match new naming conventions (initializeImportContent, initializeManageLibrary, initializeSortContent, etc.). Updated all timeout error messages to reflect actual configured timeout values. Reorganized configuration files and README to match new UI layout.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.5 - Add random dateadded metadata to NFO files for discover library sorting randomization: Added WriteRandomDateAddedToNfo helper function in MetadataService that updates NFO files with a random date from yesterday to enable randomized sorting in Jellyfin. Refactored favorite service to directly retrieve user favorites. Updated method names from CreateFoldersAsync to CreateFolderMetadataAsync for clarity.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.5 - Add random dateadded metadata to NFO files for discover library sorting randomization: Added WriteRandomDateAddedToNfo helper function in MetadataService that updates NFO files with a random date from yesterday to enable randomized sorting in Jellyfin. Refactored favorite service to directly retrieve user favorites. Updated method names from CreateFoldersAsync to CreateFolderMetadataAsync for clarity.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.4 - Add trace logging option with improved logging system: Added EnableTraceLogging configuration option that requires debug logging to be enabled. Refactored DebugLogger to use the new trace logging setting instead of debug logging for trace messages. Removed message truncation logic from trace logging. Updated configuration UI to include trace logging checkbox with proper state management. Enhanced README documentation with clearer field descriptions and updated compatibility information.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.4 - Add trace logging option with improved logging system: Added EnableTraceLogging configuration option that requires debug logging to be enabled. Refactored DebugLogger to use the new trace logging setting instead of debug logging for trace messages. Removed message truncation logic from trace logging. Updated configuration UI to include trace logging checkbox with proper state management. Enhanced README documentation with clearer field descriptions and updated compatibility information.
Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.3 - Add UserQuota endpoint implementation
Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.3 - Add UserQuota endpoint implementation
Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.2 - Test build for quotas branch
Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.2 - Test build for quotas branch
Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.2 - Added a note about functional issues with Create separate libraries for streaming services option
Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.2 - Added a note about functional issues with Create separate libraries for streaming services option

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.0 - Minor release: UI refinements (Favorite Settings section; Library Directory moved to General; Enable Plugin and Sync Interval positioned above Test Connection; dependent controls disabled when plugin disabled). Reset flow restores default networks. Backend supports NetworkMap=null to reset. README/screenshots updated to match UI.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.0 - Minor release: UI refinements (Favorite Settings section; Library Directory moved to General; Enable Plugin and Sync Interval positioned above Test Connection; dependent controls disabled when plugin disabled). Reset flow restores default networks. Backend supports NetworkMap=null to reset. README/screenshots updated to match UI.
